participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and supportive, Emma values her quiet time and enjoys creative pursuits like reading and music.
participant_1.background: I love listening to music while I eat my tuna fish salad. I would love to have a pet dog but I can't because of my job. I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me. I am very familiar with hospitals and doctors. I like drinking hot chocolate while I read my mermaid books.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Creative and vibrant, Sophia enjoys expressing herself through fashion and takes pride in her unique style.
participant_2.background: I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband. My mother worked for apple. I am not out to my family and I am worried about their acceptance. I drive a bmw. My favorite outfit is thigh high leather boots and a skirt.

content.text: I love going to comic cons. What are some of your favorite cosplays?
I love dressing up as Harley Quinn. I also like to go as Poison Ivy.
Those are great choices! I love Harley Quinn. I'm not sure what my favorite character is. I like so many of them.
I'm not out to my family and I'm worried about their acceptance. Do you have any advice?
I'm sorry to hear that. I know how it feels to be worried about not being accepted. I don't have any specific advice, but I'm here for you if you need to talk.
Thank you. That means a lot to me.
No problem. I'm happy to help.
I love reading mermaid books. What are some of your favorite ones?
I love The Little Mermaid by Hans Christian Andersen. I also like the mermaid books by Jessica Townsend.
I love The Little Mermaid too! It's my favorite Disney movie.
I'm glad to hear that you like it too.
Me too. It's a great movie.
